channel.title: Mangesh's Blog
channel.description: A blog about software development, machine learning, and technology

item.title: Hot Reload Implementation for Django Staging Environment
item.description: Learn how to implement hot reloading for Django applications in a staging environment with Docker Compose and Gunicorn for improved development experience.

item.title: How to implement soft delete in Django
item.description: Learn how to implement soft delete functionality in Django using custom managers and model mixins.

item.title: Procedural Generation: Creating Infinite Worlds
item.description: Deep dive into procedural generation technology and its applications in creating vast game worlds.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Here I'll share my projects, thoughts on technology, and more.
